Isabella Rodriguez.description: serving customers at Hobbs Cafe (taking a drink order from a table) @ the Ville:Hobbs Cafe:cafe:cafe customer seating

Maria Lopez.description: conversing about organizing a meeting at Hobbs Cafe to review research papers and finalize presentation details, including going over key points from the articles and preparing discussion questions. @ <persona> Klaus Mueller
chat: Maria Lopez
Hey Klaus, how's it going? I see you're deep into those research papers!
Klaus Mueller
Hey Maria, I'm doing well, thank you! I'm just trying to make some progress with these research articles. How about you?
Maria Lopez
I'm heading to the library to review our research papers. Do you want to discuss the presentation details later?
Klaus Mueller
Sure, Maria! I think discussing the presentation details later sounds like a great idea. Let's plan to meet after we are done with reviewing the articles.
Maria Lopez
Great, let's aim to meet at Hobbs Cafe around 1 pm to go over the presentation details!
Klaus Mueller
Sounds like a plan, Maria! I'll see you at Hobbs Cafe at 1 pm.
Maria Lopez
See you at Hobbs Cafe at 1 pm, Klaus! I'll bring my laptop for us to work on the presentation together.
Klaus Mueller
Should we also go over the key points from the second article together?
Maria Lopez
Sure, Klaus! Let's go over the key points from the second article together as well. See you at Hobbs Cafe at 1 pm!
Klaus Mueller
Should I bring anything else for our meeting at Hobbs Cafe?
Maria Lopez
You can bring any additional notes or ideas you have for the presentation. Looking forward to our meeting at Hobbs Cafe!
Klaus Mueller
Sounds good, Maria! I will make sure to bring all my notes and ideas for the presentation. Looking forward to our meeting at Hobbs Cafe!
Maria Lopez
Let's also finalize the structure of our presentation at Hobbs Cafe.
Klaus Mueller
Do you think we should also review the conclusions from our research articles before finalizing the presentation structure?
Maria Lopez
It would be helpful to review the conclusions from our research articles before finalizing the presentation structure. Let's discuss that at Hobbs Cafe!
Klaus Mueller
Should we also prepare a list of potential discussion questions for the presentation?
